page.title: 15Education con't
page.content: in a six mile radius if require. {Somerleaze School } The private school is a day preparitory school for boys and girls between the ages of 4 to 12 years catering for 60 children. The aim of the school is to provide first class education for primary children to ensure a childs full potential is fully developed. The classes are small so that each child recieves individual attention and progress is carefully watched It is also hoped to encourage a childs natural curiosity and enthuseasem and to take pride in the presentation
